text: "101 Mitigations" is the 15th episode of the 30th season of The Simpsons. It was first broadcast on the Fox network on March 3, 2019. In the episode, Homer Simpson steals Comic Book Guy's car. He tries to make himself look innocent in a court and later becomes friends with Comic Book Guy. == References == == Other websites == * Category:The Simpsons (season 30) episodes Category:2019 television episodes
title: 101 Mitigations
